data.question: What is the chemical formula for MIL-88B when methanol is used as a solvent?

What is the percentage increase in cell volume for MIL-88D when lutidine is used compared to its dried form?

What is the volume of MIL-88C when pyridine is used as a solvent?
Does the cell volume of MIL-88D increase when transitioning from its dried form to when lutidine is used?

Is the crystal system for all MIL-88 variants hexagonal?
What is the observed cell volume for MIL-88D in its as-synthesized form?
Does MIL-88C exhibit a larger cell volume increase with pyridine compared to MIL-88B with methanol?
What is the effect of temperature on the adsorption of pyridine in MIL-88D?
data.answer: Higher temperature leads to a total opening of the structure.

data.question: Is the cell volume of MIL-88C when pyridine is used greater than when DMF is used?

data.answer: Higher temperature leads to a total opening of the structure.
